title: Police arrest suspect in South Carolina mall shooting - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Police arrest suspect in South Carolina mall shooting  The Associated Press - en Español

description: COLUMBIA, S.C. (AP) — Police have arrested a suspect in connection with a shooting at a busy shopping mall in South Carolina’s capital on Saturday that left 14 people injured. Columbia Police Chief W.H.
